import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from 'src/assets/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills', templateUrl: './skills.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills.component.css'] }) export class SkillsComponent implements OnInit { habilidades : any = []; constructor(private dataService : DataService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.dataService.getDatos().subscribe (portfolio =>{ console.log(portfolio); //definir la info. a mostrar this.habilidades = portfolio.habilidad; }); } }
